comment.author: 67507070@N00
comment._content: The Princess Beatrice (Beatrice Mary Victoria Feodore; later Princess Henry of Battenberg; 14 April 1857 – 26 October 1944) was a member of the British Royal Family. She was the fifth daughter and youngest child of Queen Victoria and Prince Albert of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha. The current King of Spain, Juan Carlos, is her great-grandson.

comment.author: 37343669@N03
comment._content:
Looks like in the upper right hand corner it says 8/23/13 backwards (since it was a negative)

So i think this picture was dated August 23rd, 1913

Lovely photograph

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you!  We'll fill in the name and add the date next time we update this record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The British Anglicized the name "Battenberg" to "Mountbatten," when German names suddenly became very unpopular during World War I.
